attributes.action: stop the outsourcing of government jobs to foreign countries in an effort to reduce costs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government is planning to outsource government jobs to other countries in an attempt to reduce costs. This is being done at a time of recession, hardship and high unemployment.

This is an illustration of the lack of patriotism, pride in our country and loyalty to our citizens shown by the current government. Once these jobs have been lost to cheaper labour overseas, they will be nigh on impossible to recover. 

The Civil/Foreign Service should be staffed by British workers serving the British Government.
